author: @biggiesmol
text: I've worked with Iranian engineers. Hey, they're just human like you and me with dreams, ambitions and other human needs. So sick of the western media dehumanizing them. Or China, or Mexicans, or anyone in that matter.

author: @americanknow8232
text: Racism is originated from the economical condition. Therefore, the racism problem will not be solved until the economic problem is addressed (Main contradiction). But fanatic Christianity is a totally different problem. it is like an opium addiction. The problem stands outside of economic issues within capitalism. However, they are taking the role of dominant power in capitalism, so it should be considered as the additional force for the conservative power in capitalism. Religion can exist in socialism as long as they do not position themselves to aid one social power.

text: I am not saying that the Shah of Iran wasn't a dictator, but who isn't? That was 42 years ago, but being a dictator and having the best growing economy and looking forward to lift Iran out of poverty, was what the West in particular USA didn't like Jimmy Carter has admitted to this and even the revolution was an American made and this regime is what US stablished in Iran. But since Iran got in the list of seven countries that were supposed to be dimalished, the regime have been alerted and now fighting for it's existence.
